div.p: Welcome to Anderson School District Two's website. To learn more about our district, check out our Mission / Vision page. Curious where your one cent sales tax goes? Take a look at Your Penny at Work, where we are always adding new projects we've been able to complete thanks to your penny.
This is where staff can find all of their relevant information.
Welcome Parents! We are excited about our new webpage. If you cannot find the information you are looking for, please give us a call. We will be happy to assist.

div.span: eLearning Days extended through May 22. The Governor has ordered all schools to remain closed for the 19-20 school year.
Welcome to Anderson County School District 2

Welcome to Anderson School District Two's website. To learn more about our district, check out our Mission / Vision page. Curious where your one cent sales tax goes? Take a look at Your Penny at Work, where we are always adding new projects we've been able to complete thanks to your penny.

div.div: Anderson Two will be extending eLearning Days through May 22. Governor McMaster has ordered all schools to remain closed for the 19-20 school year. P
The South Carolina Department of Education launched SCRemoteLearning.com, a website offering digital teaching and learning resources for teachers, par
Meals will resume on Monday, April 13th. Students must be preset to receive meals. Each meal consists of a breakfast and lunch.
ASD2 has a new quick link to help the families and students during the COVID-19 Pandemic.
Anderson School District Two is striving to stay up to date with information regarding the Coronavirus. As a district, we will continue to keep everyo
We want to thank all of our bus drivers, cafeteria workers, and instructional staff! Anderson District Two appreciates all of you!
ASD2 Cancellations The following events have been canceled: All Field Trips, All School Events through March 31st , 4K Screenings
The 2020 Census is happening now. Respond today. https://2020census.gov/
The online form is now open. Montessori, Pre-Kindergarten, and 5K Kindergarten Registration for 2020-2021!

div.p: Our Anderson School District Two mission, in partnership with the total community, is to develop the potential that exists in every student to meet the needs of a changing world.
div.h3: The Vision of Anderson School District Two:
div.p:
Respecting the Past. . .
Embracing the Future. . .
Opening the World. . .
